BEAUTY Salon Space connects salon/barbershop owners and licensed beauty professionals to fill unused salon suites and salon stations on a temporary basis Booking App. At Beauty Salon Space, our goal is to make finding and booking available salon spaces simple, fast and available 24/7 to beauty professionals anywhere on the map. What’s better than being in business for yourself? Having that business really take off! With Beauty Salon Space whether you are an independent beauty professional or a salon owner, you know that renting salon space can be one of the most difficult obstacles. With our intuitive app, users can conveniently find available salon/barbershop spaces on the go.

WebApps.appLanguage: Codegniter, Ajax, Javascript, Jquery, mysql, Html, Css, Bootstrap
WebApps.appDetail: We are long established dealer selling to the United State of America & overseas markets. The company specializes in supplying top quality printing. Pre-Press, Post-Press, Materials, finishing Equipment and Spare parts. We are specialize in the trade and projection of quality second-hand and sheet-fed and web offset presses from leading manufacturers. Moreover we distribute binding machinery & carry out or arrange dismantling ship­ ping and reinstallation. We deliver quality, service with more than 500 satisfied customers. The company is located in Northerfield, Illinois towards West India. The Resources available to us allow Graphics to acquire high quality, late model machines, offering options and significant savings over new equip­ ment's. To meet customer demand our sales staff travels extensively locating, inspecting and purchasing top quality printing equipment.

Established in 1981, Avani Food Products is engaged in manufacturing and processing of Casein products, located in Mehsana - the 'Milk City' of Gujarat known for its significant presence and contribution in the dairy industry of Gujarat. Since this decade was the decade of product development & technology transformation in the dairy industry, so Avani Food Products has developed new products, process and operational tech­ niques to meet customised needs of our clients. We have also developed several value added products exclusive for our clients to make sure that our product meet customer expectation and add value to their business and make it a win- win situation.
The business has started from 2000 with Government Hospital, Semi Government Hospital, Private Hospital, Corporate industrial, Dairy, School and college.

We have the global presence in India, USA as well as Canada with a team of 200+ in-house talents. HABTAQ Solution holds expertise in web- site/application development as per clients' requirements.
